headlines.description: Sebastian Janikowski hit a 31-yard field goal in overtime and the Raiders got a defensive stop to seal what might have been the final game in Oakland with a victory over the San Diego Chargers.
headlines.shortLinkText: Raiders pull out OT win in possible Oakland finale

video.headline: Who wins on Christmas Eve: Chargers or Raiders?

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Who wins on Christmas Eve: Chargers or Raiders?) 2015/12/23 NFL LIVE OT PVC

headlines.description: Kirk Cousins threw four touchdown passes and had a season-high 365 yards and the Washington Redskins beat the Philadelphia Eagles 38-24 Saturday night to clinch the NFC East title.

video.headline: Cousins, Ertz earn game balls as Washington clinches NFC East

headlines.shortLinkText: Redskins rout Eagles to clinch NFC East title

headlines.description: Eric Decker's 6-yard touchdown catch on the first drive of overtime -- after New England chose to kick off -- lifted the Jets to a 26-20 victory Sunday.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Jets Patriots Game Ball WK 16) 2015/12/27 ODV

headlines.shortLinkText: Jets move into playoff position with OT win over Patriots

headlines.description: Brandon Weeden scored his first career rushing touchdown and threw for two more as the Texans took a big step toward clinching the AFC South title by routing the hapless Titans.

video.headline: Texans in control of AFC South

headlines.shortLinkText: Weeden runs for TD, throws two more as Texans rout Titans

headlines.description: Alex Smith threw two touchdown passes for Kansas City, and the game clock finally stopped Johnny Manziel as the Chiefs held on to beat the Cleveland Browns 17-13 on Sunday.

video.headline: Hunt, Manziel win game balls for Chiefs- Browns

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Browns Chiefs Game ball WK 16) 2015/12/27 ODV

headlines.shortLinkText: Chiefs hold off Browns for ninth straight victory

headlines.description: Third-string quarterback Charlie Whitehurst came off the bench again for the  Colts, who made a last-minute defensive stand to keep alive their faint playoff hopes Sunday.

video.headline: Colts' Robert Mathis, Dolphins' Jarvis Landry get game balls

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Colts Dolphins Game Ball WK 16) 2015/12/27 ODV

headlines.shortLinkText: Sub Whitehurst helps Colts beat Dolphins

headlines.description: Matthew Stafford threw for two touchdowns, including one to Calvin Johnson early in the fourth quarter, and the Detroit Lions beat the San Francisco 49ers 32-17 on Sunday.

video.headline: Matthew Stafford, DuJuan Harris earn game balls

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis ( Lions 49ers Game Ball WK 16) 2015/12/27 ODV

headlines.shortLinkText: Lions take advantage of mistakes to beat 49ers

headlines.description: Buffalo rookie Mike Gillislee ran 50 yards for a touchdown with 2:25 remaining to secure a 16-6 win for the Bills over the Cowboys on Sunday.

video.headline: Sammy Watkins, Sean Lee earn Bills-Cowboys game balls

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Cowboys Bills Game Ball WK 16) 2015/12/27 ODV

headlines.shortLinkText: Bills ground out win over Cowboys

headlines.description: Ka'Deem Carey caught a touchdown pass from Jay Cutler, and the third-string running back also scored on a 1-yard run to help the Bears end a three-game losing streak with a 26-21 victory.

video.headline: Unheralded Harold Jones-Quartey forces pair of turnovers in Bears' win

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Bears Buccs Game Ball WK 16) 2015/12/27 ODV

headlines.shortLinkText: Carey scores 2 TDs as Bears beat Bucs

headlines.description: Carolina's bid for an undefeated season ended Sunday when Julio Jones' dramatic 70-yard touchdown reception powered the Atlanta Falcons to a 20-13 victory over Cam Newton and the Panthers.

video.headline: Jones, Gano get game balls after Panthers upset

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Panthers Falcons Game Ball WK 16) 2015/12/27 ODV

headlines.shortLinkText: Panthers' bid for perfect season ends with loss to Falcons

headlines.description: Ryan Mallett threw for a career-high 274 yards in his first start with Baltimore and led the Ravens to a 20-17 win over the Steelers on Sunday.

video.headline: Offensive stars headline Ravens' upset win over the Steelers

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Steelers Ravens Game ball WK 16) 2015/12/27 ODV

headlines.description: Drew Brees passed for 412 yards and three touchdowns despite his injured right foot, and the New Orleans Saints beat the Jacksonville Jaguars 38-27 on Sunday.

video.headline: Pro Bowl snubs Brees, Robinson earn game balls

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Analysis (Saints Jags Game Ball WK 16) 2015/12/27 ODV

headlines.shortLinkText: Brees sharp despite foot injury, Saints beat Jaguars 38-27

headlines.description: Todd Gurley scored on a 2-yard TD run with 10:34 left, Akeem Ayers returned a fumble 45 yards for a touchdown in the first quarter and the St. Louis Rams ended Seattle's five-game win streak with
headlines.shortLinkText: Rams beat Seattle 23-17 for 1st win in Seattle since 2004

video.headline: Can Seahawks continue to roll vs. Rams?

headlines.description: Arizona sacked Aaron Rodgers eight times and returned two of his fumbles for touchdowns on Sunday in a dominant 38-8 victory that clinched a first-round playoff bye for the streaking Cardinals.
headlines.shortLinkText: Cardinals sack Rodgers 8 times, rout Packers 38-8

video.headline: Cardinals are a complete football team
Clark, Pierce like the Packers to beat Cardinals

headlines.description: Adrian Peterson ran for 104 yards and a touchdown over three quarters, Harrison Smith took one of Eli Manning's three interceptions into the end zone and the Vikings clinched a playoff berth.

video.headline: Harrison Smith, Robert Ayers get Vikings-Giants game balls

headlines.shortLinkText: Vikings rout Giants 49-17 to clinch playoff spot

venue.fullName: Sports Authority Field at Mile High

headlines.description: DeMarcus Ware beat AJ McCarron to a fumbled snap in overtime to send the Denver Broncos into the playoffs with a 20-17 win over the Cincinnati Bengals on Monday night.

video.headline: A.J. Green, Brock Osweiler earn game balls

tracking.trackingName: COM_NFL Feature (A.J. Green, Brock Osweiler earn game balls) 2015/12/28

headlines.shortLinkText: Broncos edge Bengals in OT, clinch playoff spot
